abilities.description: (PASSIVE)ICATHIAN SURPRISE4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.
abilities.name: ICATHIAN SURPRISE

abilities.description: (Q)CAUSTIC SPITTLEKog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
abilities.name: CAUSTIC SPITTLEK

abilities.description: (W)BIO-ARCANE BARRAGEKog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
abilities.name: BIO

abilities.description: (E)Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
abilities.name: K

abilities.description: (R)LIVING ARTILLERYKog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
abilities.name: LIVING ARTILLERYK
